name: How Many Days Left?
description:
You manage a group of survivors after the apocalypse.
Food is scarce. Winter is here.
Find the balance between accomplishing tasks to feed your people and knowing when a character slows you down...and get rid of them.

This game has been made for Ludum Dare 43 (Sacrifices must be made) in less than 48 hours. A lot more was planned (including some nice 3D graphics, social interactions, etc) and, as it is, the game becomes boring pretty fast.
Ludum Dare link : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/how-many-days-left

Note that some visual effects might not be available in the HTML5 version. It is highly recommended to use the downloadable versions if possible!

In HTML5 version, please play in fullscreen!
